name: breaking-change
description: Introduces backward incompatible changes - MAJOR version bump.

name: feature
description: Adds a new feature or capability - MINOR version bump.

name: fix
description: Fixes a bug without changing public behavior - PATCH version bump.

name: security
description: Addresses a security issue or hardening - PATCH or MINOR depending on scope.

name: perf
description: Improves performance without behavior change - PATCH version bump.

name: refactor
description: Code structure change without behavior change - PATCH version bump.

name: docs
description: Documentation updates or improvements - PATCH version bump.

name: test
description: Adds or updates tests without affecting production code - PATCH version bump.

name: build
description: Changes to the build system or tooling - PATCH version bump.

name: ci
description: Continuous integration or deployment workflow changes - PATCH version bump.

name: deps
description: Dependency updates or upgrades - PATCH or MAJOR depending on compatibility.

name: revert
description: Reverts a previous change - PATCH version bump.

name: approved
description: PR has been formally approved for merge and release.
